snippet.title: Railbound - Official Overview Trailer | The MIX Showcase October 2023
snippet.description: Get a deep dive into Railbound, a relaxing puzzle game about fixing train connections and traveling the world. Check out the latest trailer to see gameplay, see some of the challenges you'll encounter, and learn more about the features of the recently released Birthday Update. Railbound is available now on PC, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and mobile.
